words.sentence: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
words.author: Brandon Jenner

words.sentence: Stay positive and happy. Work hard and don't give up hope. Be open to criticism and keep learning. Surround yourself with happy, warm and genuine people.
words.author: Paulo Coelho

words.sentence: When you show deep empathy toward others, their defensive energy goes down, and positive energy replaces it. That's when you can get more creative in solving problems.
words.author: Stephen Covey
